title: Colin talks about Madden ratings with Adjuster Dustin Smith on this Saturday Special
itunes:title: Colin talks about Madden ratings with Adjuster Dustin Smith on this Saturday Special
description:
In this exclusive podcast Colin talks to Dustin Smith, the leader of the Madden Ratings Adjustor team. They talk about NFL players getting upset every year at their ratings and which players actually reach out to him and his team to complain.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
